title: File an annual return with Companies House

details.description: File company information including directors, registered office and shareholders in your AR01 annual return
details.more_information:
It costs £13 to file your annual return online.

You can pay by debit/credit card or Paypal.

You'll need a Companies House password and authentication code. 

If you don't have these, you can [register online.](https://ewf.companieshouse.gov.uk/runpage?page=webfilingRegister&signUpPage.lang=en "Register for Companies House WebFiling"){:rel="external"} You'll get the password by email. The authentication code will be posted to your company's registered office address.

%You must file your annual return within 28 days of the anniversary of the company being set up (incorporated).%

If you don’t file your annual return on time, Companies House can dissolve your company and prosecute you.
details.introduction: If you run a company you must send an annual return to Companies House. This includes details of directors, registered office address, shares and shareholders.
details.alternate_methods:
You can fill in [form AR01](http://www.companieshouse.gov.uk/forms/formsContinuation.shtml "form AR01"){:rel="external"} and post it to Companies House with your payment. It costs £40 to file your annual return on paper.

$A
Companies House  
Crown Way  
Cardiff  
CF14 3UZ
$A
